name: Component.RadTabs.Content

classitems.description: Computed _hidden accounts for whether the tab is selected (by checking activeId) && if this tab has been flagged to be hidden with property hidden
classitems.name: _hidden

return.description: String of true/false for use with `aria-hidden` binding

classitems.description: The id of the currently active tab in the scope of the rad-tabs component. This is provided privately in the rad-tabs yield hash.
classitems.name: activeId

classitems.description: Aria role tabpanel is bound for A++ accessibility.
classitems.name: ariaRole

classitems.description:
Bound attributes:

  • data-test: for precise testing identification
  • _hidden: to hide this tab if it is not selected or if prop hidden is true
classitems.name: attributeBindings

classitems.description:
Actions Up: When something changes in this component we need to let the container tabs know by firing the updateTab closure action with this tabs changed data.

(Currently the only change we're notifying on is the hidden prop)
classitems.name: didUpdateAttrs

classitems.description: Whether this tab should be hidden from view. Useful for situations where a tab needs to exist in a particular place in the tab ordering but may not have the data it needs to display information at the time when registerTab is invoked. This allows you to make sure your tab can be hidden while preserving its place in the list.
classitems.name: hidden

classitems.description: Handle registering with the tabs container on int by firing registerTab closure action with this tab's data.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: The button label text of this tab. This will be passed up via a closure action to the containing rad-tabs component.
classitems.name: label

classitems.description: Use this attribute to place a custom data-test attribute on the tab button for this tab. This will allow easier, specific/direct targeting of clicking this tab in automated testing.
classitems.name: tabDataTest

description:
This component is yielded by the rad-tabs component. The activeId and actions registerTab and updateTab are privately bound for internal use.

On init each tab will register itself with the rad-tabs wrapping container, passing all its data. The rad-tabs container uses this to build out the tab buttons.

{{#rad-tabs defaultTab="dumpsterShrimp" as |components|}}
  {{#components.content label="Shrimp" elementId="dumpsterShrimp" tabDataTest="a-nifty-tab-button"}}
    BRINGO! There's some pretty good lil' shrimpers in here, lets check it out.
  {{/components.content}}
{{/rad-tabs}}
Configuration Type Default Description
label string null Text label of the tab button for this panel
elementId string null Set a specific id for this component when using container defaultTab
tabDataTest string null data-test for the tab button

property.description: Computed _hidden accounts for whether the tab is selected (by checking activeId) && if this tab has been flagged to be hidden with property hidden
